name: Egypt
title: EGYPT
introduction: Egypt, located in northeastern Africa, is famed for its ancient civilization and monumental landmarks like the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx. Its rich history includes the Pharaohs and contributions to science, art, and architecture. The Nile River, vital for agriculture, remains central to Egypt's identity.

paragraphs: Spending time in the region was a humbeling experience, lots of amazing views and trips through the deserts at night
The desert has shown me an amazing sunrise and the waters have shown me a diverse sealife
